mapper.insert: insert into board(content, m_idx, s_idx, rating) values(#{content},#{m_idx},#{s_idx},#{rating})
mapper.select: select * from member, board where member.m_idx=board.m_idx and board.s_idx=#{s_idx} order by b_idx desc
select round(avg(rating),2) from board where s_idx=#{s_idx} group by s_idx
select count(board.content) from member, board where member.m_idx=board.m_idx and board.m_idx=${m_idx} and board.s_idx=#{s_idx}
mapper.update: update board set content=#{content} where b_idx=#{b_idx}
